attributes.action: save more hearts by donating more
attributes.additional_details: I feel that more donations should be raised in our local communties I know there is enough going on but let's take more into action by doing more fundraisers it's not know ones fault just start listening to your soul and have a heart let's start beating heart disease today.there are people dying and although there is a plan taken place sometimes it is not put into action we are not being ungrateful we are not being impatient we are just being concerned into people's health and well being.
